name: Night Visitors 2
description:
== About the Game ==

Night Visitors 2 is a top-down shooter that pits you against hordes of randomly-spawning enemies. This game was produced over a five-day period for the HALLOWEEN SUPREME JAM hosted by my good buddy JamSnack!

It's a Halloween nightmare! A mysterious and malevolent magician has summoned the vengeful spirits of forgotten video game enemies in a bid to terrorize the local town! Play the role of perky moth child Sue as she takes this opportunity to be the hero while practicing her magical skills. Be careful, though; the restless undead won't take kindly to the presence of a protagonist who is part of a game that actually got released!

== Features ==
  • A varied cast of returning characters to meet and do battle with!
  • 10 action-packed gameplay screens to overcome!
  • Randomly-spawning enemies for a different experience each time!
== Controls == -- General Controls --
  • F1, F2, F3, F4 keys: Adjust window size between 1x, 2x, 3x, or 4x resolution
  • F5 key: Adjust window size to best-fit resolution
  • Escape key: End the game
-- Menu Controls --
  • Z key / Y key / W key: Advance to the next screen
-- Game Controls --
  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z key / Y key / W key: Fire a projectile straight ahead
